casebody.data:
ACTS RETIREMENT-LIFE COMMUNITIES, INC.
v.
TOWN OF COLUMBUS 334PA16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 8, 2018 Ryan D. Bolick, Attorney at Law, Virginia M. Wooten, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Town of Columbus, North Carolina. Benjamin R. Sullivan, Jr., Attorney at Law, Charles C. Meeker, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for ACTS Retirement-Life Communities, Inc.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 5th of January 2018 by Defendant:

*441"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of January 2018."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 15th day of January 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
